hero.title: Our Products
hero.subtitle: From our farm to your table - premium quality cashew products

intro.title: Quality You Can Trust
intro.description: AfriNuts Export specializes in premium cashew products, with our processing facility launching in 2031 to provide value-added products. Currently we offer raw cashew nuts sourced from our 50-hectare farm and trusted local growers in Ivory Coast.
